name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11, Beijing. Peking University professor Dai Jinhua said at the film "Another Day Full of Hope" theme talk: I was shocked to see the ratio of masters to bachelors among Beijing express delivery workers. The ratio of masters was once 7%, and the ratio of undergraduate graduates exceeded 13%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, financier Li Lu’s latest statement was circulated online, in which he mentioned: without a modern market economy, modern technology would not emerge; fair institutional control is more sustainable than human control; the essence of a market economy is the government handing over economic power to the private sector; without personal safety guarantees, people’s pursuit of wealth will be greatly reduced.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 17, Wuchuan City, Guangdong. Dinglong Bay tourist attraction owed workers wages, and workers held up banners at the site to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 16, in Loudi, Hunan, the owners of the Country Garden Haoyuan Xia community reported that the funeral hall operated near the community often played funeral music and fireworks, which disturbed the owners' rest. That night, the owners went to negotiate and a physical conflict broke out between the two sides.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 16, Hohhot, Inner Mongolia. The future owners of Jindi Fengqi reported that the power company wanted to build a substation near the community, which caused the owners to be dissatisfied and put up banners at the sales office to defend their rights.
